name: Puzzles
description:
Puzzles the hit puzzle game.

100's of Puzzle levels, simply build columns and rows by dragging and dropping the puzzle pieces onto the grid. Build your score and compete against your friends.

100's of puzzle game levels to unlock, these great puzzle games include Shapes, Borders, Hexagons, Bombs and Timed.

Use hammers to clear spaces or Bins to replace puzzle pieces.

Puzzles offers years of free game play, keep playing feature and no time limit.
